mapper.select: SELECT di.code, di.name FROM inbyte_dict d INNER JOIN inbyte_dict_item di ON d.dict_id = di.dict_id AND di.deleted = 0 WHERE d.deleted = 0 AND d.name = #{dictName} ORDER BY ordinal ASC

SELECT di.item_id, di.parent_id, di.code, di.name, di.ordinal FROM inbyte_dict d INNER JOIN inbyte_dict_item di ON d.dict_id = di.dict_id AND di.deleted = 0 WHERE d.deleted = 0 AND d.name = #{dictName} ORDER BY ordinal ASC
SELECT di.code, di.name, di.icon FROM inbyte_dict d INNER JOIN inbyte_dict_item di ON d.dict_id = di.dict_id AND di.deleted = 0 WHERE d.deleted = 0 AND d.name = #{dictName} ORDER BY ordinal ASC
